alert.note: Alert for Tolland (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 5:48PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Tolland, south central Hampshire and southwestern Hampden Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 548 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Otis, or 14 miles east of Great Barrington, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Locations impacted include... Springfield, Chicopee, Enfield, Westfield, Holyoke, Agawam, West Springfield, Ludlow, South Hadley, Easthampton, Longmeadow, Suffield, East Longmeadow, Somers, Southwick, Granby, Southampton, Huntington, Russell and Granville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. This storm may intensify and become severe. Stay tuned to your local media for updates and possible warnings. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for northern Connecticut...and western Massachusetts.
